column1: '''''The Year's Work in English Studies''''' was a journal published annually by the English Association. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] contributed three essays for the section ''Philology: General Works'':

Tolkien wrote about writing the W sections for the [[Oxford English Dictionary]] as well as publications concerning names of places. Throughout the essays he attempted to inform the reader while including bits of humor to entertain.<ref>{{CG|CG}}</ref>
